title: Honor
body:
I hot honor lvl 3 5days ago but i didnt get capsule.
All my friends got a capsule immediately after unlocking lvl 3.

replies.body: Those [**Honor Capsules**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) have a chance of dropping after matches once you're Honor Rank 3. It's not a guaranteed drop, but you have a chance of getting them anytime you would have gotten a key fragment.
